testsuite.name: application.controller.AuthorizerControllerTest

testcase.name: test must fail on not funds from MEAL balance()
test must success on withdraw 50 reais from FOOD balance fallback()
test must fail on ACCOUNT NOT FOUND given a wrong accountId()
test must fail on withdraw 60,001 reais from FOOD balance merchant dependent()
test must fail on not funds from FOOD balance()
test must fail on withdraw 61 reais from CASH balance giving FOOD MCC fallback()
test must success on withdraw 50 reais from FOOD balance()
test must fail on withdraw 46 reais from CASH balance giving FOOD MCC fallback()
test must fail on nonexistent MCC()
test must fail on ACCOUNT NOT FOUND given a wrong accountId, fallback()
test must fail on withdraw 60,001 reais from CASH balance giving FOOD MCC fallback()
test must success on withdraw 55 reais from CASH balance giving FOOD MCC fallback()
test must success on withdraw 44,9 reais from MEAL balance fallback()
